comment: Lisa is one of the nicest professors I have had at KSU and she really loves what she teaches. I do with though that less was taught because we had to rush through each subject to "learn" everything and therefore, most people just crammed the night before the test to actually pass the assessment.

People should really be honest on here, she's nice, and yes if you looking for an easy A do the study guide. But she is not a good professor. She rushes through all the lectures. SLOW DOWN. Her notes are the WORST to read. I can't believe an easy A is costing me this much money at Kennensaw. WHY show up if all you need is a study guide to pass?
Enjoyed the class. She makes it so easy to understand science, and the labs are fun.

One of the best professors I have ever had. She is incredibly intelligent, helpful, passionate, and kind. I took two classes with her, environmental science 2 and The science behind wine making. I would definitely recommend her.

Great professor, nice and can be helpful. If you don't understand go talk to her. Three test, you can get the final to replace one. Always go to lab super  important and do the quizzes. I suggest reading the book and going to class, if not you will be lost. I hate its not simple.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: Really enjoy going to this class... that does not mean that I attended class regularly. I think that the use of the text is optional but throughout the semester she requested the use of it more. Her tests were easy as long as you study and she does give study guides. I would recommend this to any future teacher who wants to see how its done.

Intelligent woman certainly. Many of my peers liked her. I was not her biggest fan. I much prefer Dr. Callahan, who teachers ISCI 2002. But Dr. Adams certainly knows her stuff. Tests are multiple choice. DO THE STUDY GUIDE!! It was a life saver. Not necessarily hard, not easy. Life science based class. Go to class. Pay attention. You will pass.

Professor Adams is one of the most personable professors I have had here at KSU! She makes coming to class and lab super fun, and she thoroughly wants you to do well! Lectures are super interesting, and you learn some neat ways to teach science to students! There are a lot of opportunities to raise your grade, so just attend class, and take notes!

Super helpful, obviously loves what she teaches. Very kind, extremely willing to help. She will stay on a topic as long as you need to help you.  Very clear in expectations. I love the way she does lectures; you print out the notes and fill in the blanks as she goes. Much easier than trying to writedraw everything while listening! FANTASTIC 1010

Dr. Adams assumes you know prior knowledge info and runs with it. She teaches the concept quickly & you have to master the vocabulary then the concept(especially if you don't remember this from high school). Lab is cool-10 labs & quizzes, 3 tests, & final replaces lowest grade. Not to bad, I made a B.
Great teacher! Go to class. Don't buy the book. She is very willing to help and explain concepts further.

One of the best science teachers I have had. She really loves what she does. Tests are mostly from notes in class. Not mandatory to go to class, but you will miss out on a lot. Labs are fun and easy. If you don't understand something, she will do her best to help you understand the concept. Wish she taught ISCI 2002!!

Hands down the best science class I have ever taken. She is not one of those typical science teacher that assumes you know everything about the subject already. Her tests are not easy and you will have to study, she makes it very clear in class. I wish I could have had her for every science class at KSU. She's also very funny while is a bonus!

VERY effective, clear, and fun. She is excited to teach you and the labs are fun and easy. 10 labs, 10 quizzes, 3 tests, and you don't have to take the final. Very sweet teacher and enjoys what she does. If you didnt understand concepts from high school (photosynthesis/basic chemistry) she really makes it easy to break down. Interesting class.

She is a great example of an effective teacher-- organized, clear, and respectful. Her attendance is not mandatory but you will miss a lot if you do not attend. Her tests are made up 90% from the notes given in class. I wish I could take her again!
Goes fast but she really makes sure everyone understands.  Download class notes before going to class because this is what she follows for class.

Great Teacher! She will really work with you until you completely get it. Funny and friendly. I took her at 8 AM and never wanted to sleep :) She is very knowledgeable about material! Labs and Lab Quizzes are SUPER EASY! Tests are fair if you pay attention in class and study you will be fine. Tests are only half of class' total points
Friendly and very helpful. If you've got a questions she will help you try to understand it the best to her ability.

Mrs. Adams makes you love science. Attendance isn't mandatory but is strongly encouraged. Make sure you go to lab. I found the book helpful because it was nice to reread while studying. Microteaching gives you great ideas of how to teach topics for students.

GREAT PROF!!! I absolutely HATE science be she spelled it out to me better than any teacher I have ever had! I'm not a natural note-taker or someone who studies often but the way she covers things in class makes it easy to take note and clear topics to study later. I don't have the book but I learned what I needed from lecture. JUST AWESOME!

Great Professor! Very clear about all assignments and expectations. Minimal use of the textbook. The labs are fun and easy, and lab ALWAYS released early. The tests aren't too bad if you come to lecture and study :)

Dr. Adams is a wonderful professor.  Her test are fair.  She is extremely helpful if you dont understand something.Science is not my thing but I managed to get a B for the class. Lab quizzes are easy and you dont stay they entire time. Don't miss her lectures because you will definetely fall behind.  Overall I highly recommend you take her class.
Wonderful teacher.  She is passionate about the subject and makes sure you understand.  You need to go to class if you want a good grade and there are many opportunities to get a good grade.

Dr. Adams is a wonderful instructor!  I am not good at all in Science and I was able to make an A in her class.  She explains everything thoroughly.  If you don't know something ask her, she will help you! If you don't come to class you will be lost.  Loved Dr. Adams, wished she taught ISCI 2002.
This is a really difficult class but Dr. Adams is a great teacher! Her fun and enthusiastic personality makes the class fun!

She is really sweet, but also very scatterbrained. Her notes are very confusing and it is hard to keep up. If you miss a single class you will be totally lost. In order to understand what she is talking about you really do have to read the book ahead of time.

The class is super easy if you make note cards and review them for the tests. Make sure you go to lab, too! I made A's on all of my tests, but I got a B in the class because I missed 3 lab quizzes. Oooops!

Great Professor she makes the class fun and interesting. Her test questions come straight from her lectures. Do not miss a class or you will really be lost for the test! This class is not an easy A you really have to work hard for a good grade. I would highly recommend her class!

She is a great teacher! Science isn't my favorite subject, but she knows her stuff & goes above & beyond to help you understand what you're learning. Come to class! Missing one day can really put you behind.
No Comments

She is the nicest teacher and so much fun!  She has a great personality!  Her tests are exactly from what she says in class.  If she doesnt talk about it, then its not on her test!  Make sure and go to class b/c you NEVER need the book!  There is no point in buying it!  The lab is really easy, and you are never there for the entire time.

Great young teacher.  Great personality and ready to help with any questions.  This is not an easy A.  She makes you work for it but she's fair and will change a grade if you can argue (with respect) the answers.  A great teacher of teachers.
